word_mean: 消化不良，不消化：通常用来表示餐后隐约的腹部不适感
因乳食内积，脾胃受损所致，以小儿腹泻或便秘，呕吐，腹胀腹痛为主要表现的肠胃疾病。

sentence.Network_en: Indigestion is a catch-all term for any kind of stomach distress.
sentence.Network_cn: “消化不良”是个笼统的术语，可以指各种胃部不适。

sentence.Network_en: A food that is too fatty may cause indigestion.
sentence.Network_cn: 过于油腻的食物会引起消化不良.

sentence.Network_en: He was prone to indigestion after rich restaurant meals.
sentence.Network_cn: 上饭馆吃过油腻食物之后,他常受消化不良之苦.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin indigestio(n-), from in- (expressing negation) + digestio (see digestion)

entry.def: If you have indigestion, you have pains in your stomach and chest that are caused by difficulties in digesting food.

means.word_mean: 1. a disorder of digestive function characterized by discomfort or heartburn or nausea
